EmailTemplate.name: BoR Signature Needed - 2nd Follow Up
EmailTemplate.subject: Following Up: MLS Introduction
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Service__c.Contact_First_Name__c},
I hope you are having a great day! I'm following up with our previous email, you are listed as the Broker of Record requested for signature for our client's IDX request. Please let me know if you are not the correct broker or record or if you have any questions. I'm here to help!
Please click HERE to sign the IDX request form.
Best Regards,
